7.2 OLE Controls

7.2.1 Mnemonic keys

Besides the "accelerator" keys that apply when a server is active (see OLE-part-accelerators, page 301), OLE controls can also have "mnemonic" keys that will be processed by the control even if it is not already active. Mnemonics are implemented by using the following functions:

  • OLE-part-mnemonics, page 339.
  • OLE-part-on-mnemonic, page 340.
  • OLE-util-key-change, page 341.
OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
